Description.Text: Location This pleasant hotel is situated in the municipality of Sanxenxo, one of the most significant tourist regions in Galicia. Located in the delta of the River Pontevedra just 250 m from Paxarinas Beach, it is about 1.5 km to the centre of Sanxenxo whilst the centre of Portonovo is a mere 400 m away. Facilities The hotel was built in 2000. The establishment comprises a total of 86 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a café, a bar, a library, a laundry service and a conference room. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. The grounds of the accommodation feature a playground and an attractive garden. Guests arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the garage or in the car park. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating, a living room and a bathroom. A balcony is included as standard in most rooms, offering additional space for relaxation. A king-size bed ensures a good night's sleep. A safe and a minibar are also available. Guests will also find a fridge included as standard. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. A hairdryer is also available. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. Tennis and paddle tennis are available to active guests. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities, including a gym. Various wellness options are available at the establishment, including a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, massage treatments and a solarium. Leisure facilities include an entertainment programme, a disco and a kids' club. Meals Half board is bookable. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast or dinner.
